translation.Message_0_Page_0: Well, welcome to the fort, <name_char>. Keep in mind all my men are armed, so think twice before doing anything.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: We're here after something happened in the Marseille Safezone. All we know is the location has been irradiated, and my remaining men piled into a Maelstrom and fled.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: We managed to pick up a few survivors along the way.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: We are barely surviving, and we could probably help each other out.
